about_the_game:
Strap in for Caddywack! Dive into a high-octane blend of arcade-style driving and inventive platforming in this physics-based puzzle game that's all about precision and speed. Navigate through thrilling levels where each stage presents a new passenger and a challenging route packed with obstacles.

Key Features:

Exciting Physics-Based Gameplay: Experience the rush of managing your car's momentum, mastering jumps, and overcoming physics-based puzzles to reach your destination.

Race Against Time: Every level challenges you to deliver passengers to their destinations before time runs out. Can you beat the clock?

Join the Caddywack community and put your reflexes to the ultimate test. Can you ensure every passenger reaches their destination in time?

name: Caddywack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
